staxel.village.character.dialogue.MorelA: (안함)Are you here to talk about the mushrooms?
(안함)Was there something you wanted to talk about, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;?
(안함)What did it feel like to be a mushroom?
(안함)You might think that I only care for mushrooms...
(안함)But I assure you I have other hobbies!
(안함)I'm also interested in the things you can do with mushrooms!
(안함)I tried asking ^c:1486b0;Cirahna^c:pop; for the secret to that formula she used on you...
(안함)She won't tell me what it was though...
